meta.description: Value-based metrics for Thunderdome. Commits are vanity. Shipped value is sanity.

anti_patterns: Lines of code (more is often worse)

pr_merged.why: Code reviewed, tested, and accepted by the team

issue_closed.why: A problem was solved, not just worked on

spec_approved.why: Design work that prevents future bugs and rework

feature_demo.why: Something you can show to a user

pr_with_tests.why: Proves it works, not just compiles

pr_rejected.why: Work that didn't meet the bar

commits_without_pr.note: Activity, not delivery. Doesn't count until merged.

commentary_notes.high_commits_low_merges: Bill's been busy, but the commit log doesn't equal the scoreboard. Until those PRs merge, it's all potential energy.
commentary_notes.low_commits_high_impact: Noah played it quiet, but that spec he shipped? That's preventing three weeks of rework. The smart money sees it.
commentary_notes.balanced: Both devs bringing different value. The shaman and the professional, each playing their game.
